title: Sales Lab - Complete Roleplay Session Normal Flow
description: Verify a user can successfully complete the Sales Lab flow: Setup, Roleplay Chat with AI Customer, and Feedback without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Sales Lab page
Complete Setup step with valid input data
Verify that the Roleplay Chat interface is loaded
Engage in conversation with AI customer using text input
Verify AI customer responds appropriately to user inputs
Complete roleplay by indicating purchase intent
Verify Feedback step is displayed with detailed performance metrics

title: Sales Lab Auto Mode - TTS and STT Integration
description: Verify that in Sales Lab Auto Mode, Text-to-Speech (TTS) plays fully before microphone activates for Speech-to-Text (STT) input.

steps.description: Navigate to Sales Lab and enable Auto Mode
Start roleplay chat and listen for AI customer TTS response
Verify TTS output plays fully without interruption
Verify microphone activates automatically after TTS finishes
Speak user response and verify it is captured by STT correctly

title: Sales Lab Session Termination on Goodbye or Purchase Intent
description: Verify that the Sales Lab session ends naturally when the user says goodbye or indicates a purchase intent.

steps.description: Start a Sales Lab roleplay session
Send user utterance indicating goodbye
Verify the session terminates and feedback is triggered
Restart a new Sales Lab session
Send user utterance indicating purchase intent
Verify the session terminates and feedback is triggered

title: AI Chatbot Markdown Rendering and Response Splitting
description: Verify that AI Chatbot responses are correctly split into summaries and detailed sections, and render markdown including bold text and tables.

steps.description: Open AI Chatbot interface
Send a query that triggers a long AI response containing markdown elements such as tables and bold text
Verify the response is split into summary and detailed parts
Verify rendering of markdown elements is correct, including tables and bold styling

title: Chat History Persistence Using IndexedDB
description: Verify that chat histories in both Sales Lab and AI Chatbot are saved to and restored from IndexedDB correctly across sessions.

steps.description: Start a chat session in Sales Lab / AI Chatbot and enter multiple messages
Close the browser tab or refresh the page
Reopen Sales Lab / AI Chatbot and navigate to the chat interface
Verify that previous chat history is loaded from IndexedDB

title: Mobile Chat Interface Usability with On-Screen Keyboard
description: Ensure that on mobile devices, the chat input interface is not obscured by the on-screen keyboard and remains fully usable.

steps.description: Access Sales Lab and AI Chatbot on a mobile device or emulator
Focus chat input field to trigger the on-screen keyboard
Verify chat input is fully visible and accessible, not hidden behind the keyboard
Verify user can scroll chat history and type messages without interface issues

title: Admin Console - User Management Functionalities
description: Verify Admin Console allows admin to create, update, and delete users via the simulated backend API.

steps.description: Log in to Admin Console with valid admin credentials
Navigate to User Management section
Create a new user with valid data and save
Verify the new user appears in the user list
Edit the created user's role and save changes
Verify the user's updated details are correctly displayed
Delete the created user
Verify the user is removed from the user list

title: Admin Console - Content and Product Management
description: Verify admin can add, edit, and remove content and products, and changes persist via simulated APIs.

steps.description: Log in to Admin Console and navigate to Content Management
Add new study content with required fields and save
Verify new content appears in the list
Edit existing content details and save
Verify updated content details persist
Navigate to Product Management
Add a new product and save
Verify product appears in listing and details are correct
Delete a product
Verify product is no longer listed

title: Study Room - Tab Navigation and Content Loading
description: Validate tabbed navigation in Study Room correctly switches between study materials and content loads with no errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Study Room page
Select each tab sequentially
Verify content relevant to each tab loads completely
Verify no UI glitches or errors occur during tab switch

title: Home Dashboard - Overview and Navigation Shortcuts
description: Verify Home Dashboard loads user progress overview correctly and all quick access links navigate to respective pages.

steps.description: Log in and open Home Dashboard
Verify user progress metrics are displayed and accurate
Click each quick access link
Verify navigation to the target page occurs correctly

title: Sales Lab - Error Handling for Setup with Invalid Inputs
description: Verify proper error messages and validation occur when invalid data is input during Sales Lab Setup.

steps.description: Navigate to Sales Lab Setup
Input invalid or empty required fields
Attempt to proceed to next step
Verify appropriate validation error messages are shown and progression is blocked

title: AI Chatbot - Voice Mode Toggle and Voice Input Handling
description: Verify switching between voice mode and text mode works correctly and voice inputs are processed properly.

steps.description: Open AI Chatbot and enable voice mode
Verify UI updates to indicate voice mode active
Provide voice input and verify correct transcription
Verify AI response is rendered with correct markdown and voice output plays if enabled
Disable voice mode and input text message
Verify text input is accepted and AI responds accordingly

title: Admin Console - System Settings Update
description: Verify that the admin can update system settings and changes are persisted and reflected across the platform.

steps.description: Log in to Admin Console and navigate to System Settings
Modify a system setting such as session timeout or voice settings
Save the settings
Verify settings persist and the platform behavior reflects the updated settings

title: Sales Lab - Edge Case Handling for Unexpected User Inputs
description: Verify the Sales Lab roleplay gracefully handles unexpected or nonsensical user inputs without crashing or freezing.

steps.description: Start a Sales Lab chat session
Send nonsensical or out-of-context inputs repeatedly
Verify AI customer responds gracefully or prompts user to rephrase
Verify no application crashes or freezes occur

title: Data Persistence - Zustand and IndexedDB Integration
description: Verify the integration of Zustand state management with IndexedDB persistence works correctly preserving user state across sessions.

steps.description: Perform actions that modify global and user state such as adjusting settings or chat messages
Close and reopen the application
Verify modified state is restored correctly via IndexedDB and Zustand stores
